tools.name: get_crypto_price
tools.description: Get real-time cryptocurrency price from Chainlink decentralized oracles and Binance. Returns price from both sources with timestamp. Supports BTC, ETH, SOL, MATIC, AVAX, LINK, DOT, ADA, and 20+ assets.

asset.description: Crypto asset symbol (e.g. BTC, ETH, SOL, MATIC, AVAX, LINK)

tools.name: get_prediction_market
tools.description: Get Polymarket CLOB (Central Limit Order Book) best bid/ask prices for a prediction market. Returns real executable prices, spread, depth, and token IDs for programmatic trading. Much more accurate than Gamma API's stale outcomePrices.

tools.name: quick_research
tools.description: Run a quick web-grounded research query (~20 seconds). Uses Gemini Flash with Google Search grounding for fast, cited answers. Returns a 400-600 word report with source URLs. Great for fact-checking, current events, and quick data lookups.

tools.name: deep_research
tools.description: Run a deep autonomous research investigation (~5 minutes). Uses Gemini Deep Research Pro to search multiple sources, cross-reference information, and produce comprehensive cited reports. Returns 2000-5000 word reports with full citations. Best for complex topics requiring thorough analysis.

tools.name: render_webpage
tools.description: Render a web page with headless Chromium and extract content as markdown, text, or HTML. Handles JavaScript-rendered SPAs and dynamic pages that simple HTTP fetchers can't read. Includes anti-SSRF protection.

tools.name: screenshot_webpage
tools.description: Capture a full-page or viewport screenshot of any web page as a PNG image (base64 encoded). Useful for visual verification, monitoring, and archiving.

full_page.description: True for full page screenshot, False for viewport only

tools.name: extract_from_webpage
tools.description: Extract specific elements from a web page using CSS selectors. Renders with Chromium first, then extracts matching elements. Returns content in text, markdown, or HTML format.

tools.name: webpage_to_pdf
tools.description: Convert any web page to a PDF document (base64 encoded). Renders with Chromium for accurate layout including CSS and JavaScript content.

url.description: Full URL to convert to PDF (https:// required)

tools.name: list_services
tools.description: List all available API for Chads services with endpoints, descriptions, and x402 pricing. Returns the complete service catalog including base URLs for direct REST API access.

resources.name: Service Catalog
resources.description: Complete catalog of all API for Chads services, endpoints, pricing, and authentication methods.

prompts.name: market_analysis
prompts.description: Analyze a prediction market using real CLOB data. Gets current prices, spread, and depth, then provides trading insight.

prompts.name: crypto_report
prompts.description: Generate a comprehensive crypto asset report combining real-time price data with web research.

arguments.name: asset
arguments.description: Crypto asset symbol (e.g. BTC, ETH, SOL)
